After Sales+Insurance Services+Policy Re.EXPLANATION: Percentage of existing policies renewed compared to the total number of policies up for renewal, indicating the effectiveness of renewal efforts.
After Sales+Insurance Services+Policy Re.FORMULA: (Number of Renewed Policies / Total Number of Policies Expiring) * 100

After Sales+Insurance Services+Policy Re.KPIS: Customer retention rate through policy renewals.
After Sales+Insurance Services+Policy Re.EXPLANATION: Percentage of customers retained through policy renewals compared to the total number of customers, reflecting the success of retention strategies.
After Sales+Insurance Services+Policy Re.FORMULA: (Number of Renewals by Existing Customers / Total Number of Renewal Opportunities) * 100

After Sales+Insurance Services+Policy Re.EXPLANATION: Percentage of policy renewal offers converted into actual renewals, indicating the effectiveness of renewal offers and processes.
After Sales+Insurance Services+Policy Re.FORMULA: (Number of Renewed Policies / Total Number of Renewal Offers Sent) * 100

After Sales+Insurance Services+Policy Re.KPIS: ROI (Return on Investment) from policy renewals.
After Sales+Insurance Services+Policy Re.EXPLANATION: Financial return achieved from policy renewals compared to the costs incurred, calculated as the ratio of benefits to expenses.
After Sales+Insurance Services+Policy Re.FORMULA: (Revenue from Policy Renewals - Cost of Policy Renewals) / Cost of Policy Renewals * 100

After Sales+Insurance Services+Policy Re.EXPLANATION: Average cost incurred to process each policy renewal, including administrative and operational expenses.
After Sales+Insurance Services+Policy Re.FORMULA: Total Cost of Processing Policy Renewals / Total Number of Policy Renewals

After Sales+Insurance Services+Policy Re.KPIS: Policy renewal compliance with regulatory requirements.
After Sales+Insurance Services+Policy Re.EXPLANATION: Degree to which policy renewal processes adhere to legal and regulatory requirements, measured through audits and compliance checks.
After Sales+Insurance Services+Policy Re.FORMULA: (Number of Compliant Renewals / Total Number of Policy Renewals) * 100

After Sales+Insurance Services+Policy Re.EXPLANATION: Measure of customer satisfaction with the policy renewal process, gathered through surveys and feedback.
After Sales+Insurance Services+Policy Re.FORMULA: Average Customer Satisfaction Score for Policy Renewal Process

After Sales+Insurance Services+Policy Re.EXPLANATION: Rate at which improvements are made to the policy renewal process based on feedback and performance reviews.
After Sales+Insurance Services+Policy Re.FORMULA: (Current Process Efficiency Score - Previous Process Efficiency Score) / Previous Process Efficiency Score * 100
